tweet: Just ordered a controller pak and Goldeneye for my N64. It's the only console I use at the moment
Hi @o2 - I'm trying to get an o2 open code sent to me but have been getting "Failed to send voucher, please try again later" all morning.

Arse. I've been using the OmniGraffle trial and it's awesome. Really didn't want to buy any more software this year. Any alternatives?
I get 30% off any phone price and line rental with o2 through my day job so I can't see me changing networks!
